dateline.name:
431 Stevens street
Camden, N Jersey—U S A

body.p: I have to-day forwarded by mail, to same address as this card, my Two Vols., L of G. and Two Riv[ulets]--Please let me know, (by postal card will do) soon as they reach you safely. Another set of same Two Vols. will be sent you soon.
